description: When actor George Takei was 4 years old, he was labeled an "enemy" by the U.S. government and sent to a string of incarceration camps. His new children's book about that time is My Lost Freedom.
title: George Takei 'Lost Freedom' some 80 years ago – now he's written that story for kids

description: NPR's Scott Simon remarks on the long career of John Sterling, the New York Yankees' play-by-play announcer, who is retiring at the age of 85.
title: Opinion: The voice of Yankees legends bids farewell

description: Nearly a decade ago, HBO's The Jinx helped kick off the true-crime boom, and played a role in the arrest of suspected murder Robert Durst. Now, its follow-up series is grasping for revelations.
title: So far, the biggest mystery of the new 'Jinx' is: What's the mystery?
